definition: A flat, circular object typically made of a hard material, often used for serving or holding food, or as a surface for writing or working. It can also refer to a flat, thin piece of a certain substance, commonly used in construction or manufacturing.

examples.english: The plate is made of porcelain.

examples.german: Er hat eine Platte in seinem Kopf.
examples.english: He has a plate in his head.
The plate is full of scratches.
